sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR , A.JOB_EVAL_ITEM_ID , A.JOB_EVAL_ITEM_NM , A.WEIGHT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEM_DETAIL_EVAL_METRIC WHERE YEAR=#findYear# AND JOB_EVAL_ITEM_ID = A.JOB_EVAL_ITEM_ID AND DELETE_DT IS NULL) AS DETAIL_EVAL_METRIC_COUNT , A.SORT_ORDER FROM MEM_JOB_EVAL_ITEM A WHERE A.YEAR=#findYear# AND DELETE_DT IS NULL ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER

SELECT YEAR , JOB_EVAL_ITEM_ID , JOB_EVAL_ITEM_NM , CONTENT , WEIGHT , SORT_ORDER , CASE WHEN DELETE_DT IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS USE_YN FROM MEM_JOB_EVAL_ITEM WHERE YEAR = #year# AND JOB_EVAL_ITEM_ID = #jobEvalItemId#
SELECT 'JEI'||NVL(LPAD(MAX(SUBSTR(JOB_EVAL_ITEM_ID,4,4))+1,4,'0'),'0001') AS JOB_EVAL_ITEM_ID FROM MEM_JOB_EVAL_ITEM WHERE YEAR = #year#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MEM_JOB_EVAL_ITEM ( YEAR , JOB_EVAL_ITEM_ID , JOB_EVAL_ITEM_NM , CONTENT , WEIGHT , SORT_ORDER , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #jobEvalItemId# , #jobEvalItemNm# , #content# , #weight# , #sortOrder# , sysdate )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MEM_JOB_EVAL_ITEM SET JOB_EVAL_ITEM_NM = #jobEvalItemNm# , CONTENT = #content# , WEIGHT = #weight# , SORT_ORDER = #sortOrder# , MODIFY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE YEAR = #year# AND JOB_EVAL_ITEM_ID = #jobEvalItemId#
UPDATE MEM_JOB_EVAL_ITEM SET SORT_ORDER = #sortOrder# , MODIFY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE YEAR = #year# AND JOB_EVAL_ITEM_ID = #jobEvalItemId#
UPDATE MEM_JOB_EVAL_ITEM SET DELETE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE YEAR = #year# AND JOB_EVAL_ITEM_ID = #jobEvalItemId#
